cards.front: What is supervised learning in machine learning?
cards.back: Supervised learning is a type of machine learning where the model is trained on labeled data, meaning that each training example is paired with an output label. The algorithm learns to predict the output from the input data.

insights.title: The Importance of Iterative Learning in Machine Learning Models
insights.takeaway: Machine learning models improve their performance through iterative training processes, where they learn from data patterns and refine predictions over time. This emphasizes the necessity for continuous model evaluation and adjustment to enhance accuracy and adaptability.
